decks.notes: By playing aggressive creatures and disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push, this Rakdos Aggro deck aims to control the board and lower the opponent's life total quickly. Utilizing cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker and Voldaren Epicure, the deck can generate card advantage and put pressure on the opponent. With support from companions like Jegantha, the Wellspring, the deck is able to keep a consistent game plan while utilizing powerful cards like Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger and Voldaren Thrillseeker to finish off the opponent.

This deck focuses on aggressive plays using Spirit creatures as the main threat. By utilizing cards like Mausoleum Wanderer, Spell Queller, and Supreme Phantom, the deck aims to control the board and pressure the opponent quickly. The inclusion of cards like No More Lies and Wedding Announcement provide disruption and versatility, while The Wandering Emperor and Skyclave Apparition offer additional removal options. With a mix of evasive threats and disruptive spells, this Spirit Aggro deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory through aggressive and strategic plays.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana while maximizing devotion to green to benefit from powerful green cards. By efficiently playing low-cost creatures like Llanowar Elves and Elvish Mystic, combined with cards like Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx and Storm the Festival, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big green threats like Cavalier of Thorns and Old-Growth Troll. Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner provides card draw and ramp, while Invasion of Ixalan helps to generate tokens and maintain board presence. The deck utilizes a variety of lands to ensure consistent mana production and powerful plays.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly with cards like Elvish Mystic and Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx to cast powerful green creatures such as Cavalier of Thorns and Old-Growth Troll. Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner helps draw cards and untap mana sources, while cards like Storm the Festival and Invasion of Ixalan help to support the aggressive strategy. The inclusion of Leyline of the Guildpact and Outcaster Trailblazer provide additional ways to boost devotion to green, enabling powerful effects like Elesh Norn, Mother of Machines and Boseiju, Who Endures.
